embed.description: Please include as many details as possible to troubleshoot.

fields.name: 3. What errors occurred:
fields.value: Please paste into here: https://bytebin.lucko.me/ and then click upload and send the link!

fields.name: 4. Steps/models to reproduce:
fields.value: This may include a build schematic, a video, or detailed instructions to help reconstruct the issue

fields.name: 6. Server version:
fields.value: Paste the output of running /version on your server WITH the Minecraft version. latest is not a version; we require the output of /version so we can properly track down the issue.

fields.name: 7. Anything else:
fields.value: Anything else you think may help us resolve the problem
